mapper.update:
update fdp_dispatch_complete_profile_log
dispatch_order_id = #{dispatchOrderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fault_dispatch_request_id = #{faultDispatchRequestId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_complete_profile_file = #{userCompleteProfileFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_complete_profile_file_name = #{userCompleteProfileFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_complete_profile_photo = #{userCompleteProfilePhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_complete_profile_photo_name = #{userCompleteProfilePhotoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_complete_time = #{userCompleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_job_performance = #{userJobPerformance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_job_end_reason = #{userJobEndReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update fdp_dispatch_complete_profile_log set dispatch_order_id = #{dispatchOrderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fault_dispatch_request_id = #{faultDispatchRequestId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_complete_profile_file = #{userCompleteProfileFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_complete_profile_file_name = #{userCompleteProfileFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_complete_profile_photo = #{userCompleteProfilePhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_complete_profile_photo_name = #{userCompleteProfilePhotoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_complete_time = #{userCompleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_job_performance = #{userJobPerformance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_job_end_reason = #{userJobEndReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT log.user_complete_profile_file userCompleteProfileFile, log.user_complete_profile_file_name userCompleteProfileFileName, log.user_complete_profile_photo userCompleteProfilePhoto, log.user_complete_profile_photo_name userCompleteProfilePhotoName, ffdhr.user_assm_memo userAssmMemoy FROM fdp_dispatch_complete_profile_log log LEFT JOIN (SELECT fault_dispatch_request_id,user_assm_memo FROM fdp_fault_dispatch_hr_relation WHERE flag_used = 1 AND flag_deleted = 0) ffdhr on log.fault_dispatch_request_id = ffdhr.fault_dispatch_request_id WHERE log.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
